article_title: Will HCA Stock Gain on Q1 Earnings Beat?
article_text:
7 Stocks to Buy for When Hillary Clinton Is President

Hillary Clinton has promised to be tough on Wall Street once she's in the White House, but there are many ways investors should be able to profit from her presidency.

article_metadata.description: HCA stock is sliding on Tuesday morning even though the hospital operator posted strong earnings and revenue for the 2016 first quarter.
article_metadata.author: Kaya Yurieff
